actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to make a supplemental appropriation to conduct the survey to determine the feasibility of, and to carry out the program to demonstrate the practicability of, extending the navigation season on the Great Lakes and St. Lawrence Seaway.

summary.text: Makes appropriations for the survey of the Great Lakes and Saint Lawrence Seaway and for the demonstration program of the practicability of extending the navigation season on such waterways pursuant to the River and Harbor Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to make a supplemental appropriation to conduct the survey to determine the feasibility of, and to carry out the program to demonstrate the practicability of, extending the navigation season on the Great Lakes and St. Lawrence Seaway.
